### **Divergent Thinking**

```{r}
# 匯入替代用途測驗各物品的獨創性評分
aut_pb <- read.csv("C:/Users/David/Desktop/實驗資料分析/Alternative Uses Test - 試評分/塑膠袋.csv", stringsAsFactors = TRUE)
aut_hd <- read.csv("C:/Users/David/Desktop/實驗資料分析/Alternative Uses Test - 試評分/吹風機.csv", stringsAsFactors = TRUE)
aut_c <- read.csv("C:/Users/David/Desktop/實驗資料分析/Alternative Uses Test - 試評分/硬幣.csv", stringsAsFactors = TRUE)
aut_tp <- read.csv("C:/Users/David/Desktop/實驗資料分析/Alternative Uses Test - 試評分/衛生紙.csv", stringsAsFactors = TRUE)
aut_ch <- read.csv("C:/Users/David/Desktop/實驗資料分析/Alternative Uses Test - 試評分/衣架.csv", stringsAsFactors = TRUE)
aut_t <- read.csv("C:/Users/David/Desktop/實驗資料分析/Alternative Uses Test - 試評分/牙膏.csv", stringsAsFactors = TRUE)
```

```{r}
# 計算替代用途測驗各物品獨創性的評分者間信度

icc(aut_c, model = "twoway", type = "agreement", unit = "average")
icc(aut_tp, model = "twoway", type = "agreement", unit = "average")
icc(aut_ch, model = "twoway", type = "agreement", unit = "average")
icc(aut_t, model = "twoway", type = "agreement", unit = "average")
```
